  • Jump Start Commander

    When it comes to building commander decks, I lean toward the esoteric. I think of each deck concept as a puzzle and each game as an opportunity to show off a hard-won solution. With this project, I wanted to deconstruct the very concept of a deck a littleâ€”what if a deck could actually be ten decks?
